items.title: Charging Management System
items.text: Efficiently monitor, control, and optimize your EV charging operations.

items.title: EV Fleet Management
items.text: Optimize your electric vehicle fleet with our comprehensive EV Fleet Management solution.

items.title: Lead Validation and ROI Calculation tool
items.text: Optimize your electric vehicle fleet with our comprehensive EV Fleet Management solution.

items.title: Hub System for Interoperability (Coming Soon)
items.text: Ensuring seamless integration and communication between various electric vehicle charging networks and platforms using the OCPI (Open Charge Point Interface) protocol.

items.title: Custom Protocol Management tool (Coming Soon)
items.text: Management Tool allowing you to tailor OCPI (Open Charge Point Interface) and OCPP (Open Charge Point Protocol) protocols to meet the specific needs of your EV chargers.

items.title: Control System Design (Coming Soon)
items.text: Service focusing on the manufacturing of advanced control units for EV charging stations.
